algorithm_technique: 2D prefix sum (integral image) for O(1) range sum queries after O(m*n) preprocessing.
problem_summary_simple: Calculate the sum of elements within a rectangular region of a 2D matrix.
problem_summary_technical: Precompute a 2D prefix sum array (integral image) to answer range sum queries in O(1) time.
key_insights: The core idea is to precompute sums of all possible top-left sub-rectangles.
Using the principle of inclusion-exclusion with the prefix sum array allows O(1) query.
The prefix sum array `sums[i][j]` stores the sum of elements from `matrix[0][0]` to `matrix[i-1][j-1]`.
